title: EV Battery Mineral Sourcing: DRC Cobalt Audit Findings
summary: A well-sourced investigation into cobalt sourcing practices in the DRC, drawing on auditor reports and verified mine data.

EVID.rationale: Multiple auditor reports and public datasets cited.

MECH.rationale: Mechanism from mine to battery cell clearly traced.

RISK.rationale: ESG regulatory risk quantified by jurisdiction.

SPEC.rationale: Claim-level specificity moderate; some aggregate figures.

claims.text: CMOC reported 42,000 MT cobalt output from Tenke Fungurume in 2023.
RCS Global audit found 78% traceability compliance among tier-1 DRC suppliers.
Child labour incidents at ASM sites decreased 18% following OECD programme rollout.
Battery-grade cobalt spot price averaged $33,500/MT in H1 2024.
Three top-5 OEMs are projected to require blockchain traceability by 2026.
